mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_space_strategy( space_id, strategy_name, strategy_is_enable, device_function_type, strategy_data, strategy_data_smaller_than, strategy_data_bigger_than, sort_no, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, version, del_flag ) VALUES
( #{item.spaceId}, #{item.strategyName}, #{item.strategyIsEnable}, #{item.deviceFunctionType}, #{item.strategyData}, #{item.strategyDataSmallerThan}, #{item.strategyDataBiggerThan}, #{item.sortNo}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.updateBy}, #{item.version}, #{item.delFlag} )
mapper.select: SELECT concat(ts.id,'@',tss.device_function_type) AS spaceUnionStrategy, tss.id AS strategyId, tss.strategy_name, tss.strategy_data, tss.strategy_data_bigger_than, tss.strategy_data_smaller_than, tss.device_function_type, tss.strategy_is_enable FROM t_space_strategy AS tss LEFT JOIN t_space AS ts ON tss.space_id = ts.id WHERE tss.del_flag = '0' AND ts.id IS NOT NULL
